评论详情: My daughter got married and after much research online , I decided on this dress. I bought 2 different sizes because I am a 34DD and the info on the dress said that it ran small so to order a size up. I’m glad that I ordered an 8 and a 10. Normally I’m an 8 but it was too tight in the breast area. The 10 fit perfectly! It’s flowy and so pretty. Very comfortable and it has a sewn in slip under , so it’s not see through. The top of the dress has some stretch which is good if you’re bigger in breast size. I love that it accentuated my waist .

This dress is absolutely lovely and fit me perfectly. I wore it too a wedding and got compliments on it. The material is sturdy but breathable. The zipper would have a little hiccup at the spot the two different fabrics met but other than that it moved flawlessly.  I had initially ordered in a different color but ended up wearing this one. I kept both dresses.

评论概述: PERFECT for the reception dress for my wedding
评论详情: This dress exceeded all expectations. My actual wedding dress was huge (and uncomfortable) and I wanted something that was flowy and elegant, while still being comfortable. WOW was this the perfect buy! For reference I am 5'4" and 130 lbs and got a size 4.
Love everything about the dress.  It is low cut so you may have to choose your undergarments wisely.  Lots of compliments

This dress was absolutely beautiful. The styling was great for the wedding it was worn to. I would definitely buy this again. I had a size Large, true to size. The stretchiness was great, still allowed for the dress to flow in the breeze. Light weight and super comfy.
Seams were incomplete. Looked cheap.
This was a perfect dress for my tiny wedding. It was super flattering too

Ordered this dress for a cocktail party!  It was a great fit and so comfortable!  Looked great on and was very happy with the style!

LOVE IT!

The fit was true to size. I am 170lbs with small bust. I ordered a 10 and it needed no alterations. Loved the comfort and the dress is very stylish. I wore it at a wedding and it was great as a formal dress.

I love this dress. I wore it for my wedding.  It was 117 degrees out and this dress was breathable.  I’m 4’11 so it fit me like a full-length dress.  The chest is not very stretchy so I went two sizes up to find the perfect fit.

评论概述: Fits as it is supposed to I was very pleased with this dress
评论详情: I picked the stress out for our wedding rehearsal and absolutely love the fitting of it. Everything about it was perfect.
Very gorgeous color and very well made. High quality. I wore this for my legal wedding ceremony and I’m in love. Sizing is true to size. It fit me perfectly.
Bought for a garden party. Pretty, well fitting and good quality.

Don’t mind my kids mirror😳, anyways this dress is beautiful I got tons of compliments on it.  Color was just as it was described besides this was called a blue but it’s def a turquoise blue you can see that in the picture of the item on the sale page (don’t worry my hair and makeup were done after these photos.) it did come wrinkly but a steamer will get them right out.  The color is true and the size make sure you measure.  You can also wear a regular bra with this dress!!!!!! Quality is great, there is some give at the waist area and slight give in the chest but I would still measure if your a half in off on chest or waist go with the smaller size mine was slightly big in the chest area but manageable.  I ordered a US 12 my measurements are as follows.  152 lbs 5’2 chest is 36, waist 31 hips are 41 (though those were the measurements when I bought it I retain fluid due to my SLE so the day the event hips were a 39.1 it still fit with both measurements!) shoes were also bought on Amazon!

评论概述: True to size and very comfortable
评论详情: I love this dress. I bought it for a formal dinner and gala and the fit was true to size, comfortable material. Beautiful style and perfect for the occasion. The dress arrived on time and I could not have been happier with my purchase. 10/10 recommend!!!
I have received tons of compliments while wearing this dress

A little young for me, good quality.

I absolutely loved how this dress looked on, but was so disappointed that the armholes are weirdly short. The fabric of the dress was way up in my armpit which made the straps feel too small. Otherwise the dress was so pretty and flattering so I’m really bummed with how uncomfortable the arms are. I also received a very obvious return as the bag was ripped open already when I received it and the dress was unzipped and balled up inside.

I bought this for my stepdaughter to where at my wedding. It was a good choice. Stretchy material no zipper so it fit her well. The style flowed well with the semi-formal aesthetics. The quality was overall good but it did have a slight smell upon opening on the straps. Be prepared to steam it because it is a little wrinkly when you open.

评论概述: It will be a perfect dress for my 50 year wedding anniversary celebration.
评论详情: It fits perfectly, and flows nicely.  Good quality.

I usually only buy clothes that I can try on, because buying online  could never met my expectations. This dress however has not disappointed. I bought it to attend the wedding. It looks expensive and very dressy. I wish I bought size 6, because I like a tighter fit. Eventhough I usually wear size 8, this dress was labeled 8-10 on the bag. I have a smaller breast size (34 B), it will work better for the fuller breasted figure. Worth of noting that the top part is a little stretchy. Overall, I am very pleased with this dress. It definitely a winner. The actual color is deeper to me than on the picture, but it does not ruin anything for me. Can not wait to rock it on the wedding! I am 145 lbs., 5'4", 37" bust, 33" waist, 39" hips.

It fit perfectly

I really like this dress. It fits great and is so beautiful the way it is flowey on the bottom. It is a great length. I am a pear shape, 5’9” tall, a 31” waist in jeans, 38D bust size, and a size 12. It is so nice how this dress is an empire waist and is still fitted but slowly flares into its A-line. It is a very low cut on the bust part so I put a lacy cami under the dress. It does not stretch with your bust so I ordered the size according to my bust size, which was the size 14. (The other reviews on this dress really helped me out too) I was afraid it might be too big but It still fit great in the waist. A size up was a good thing.  The material is soft and flows nice. It is a great dress for the ballet, graduation, a party, or just dinner out.
I liked the dress it runs small and is cut very low. I had to add material to cover up some of my cleavage and I still had a lot of exposure.
I love this one. I wore in my cruise and really felt good with photos and all.

I love the dress , I went out to a concert on 4/26 and gotten so much compliments on the dress and the color drawn so much attention , it fits perfect and the top part snugg perfectly,  I highly recommend it my dress is a size 14

Great dress!

The satin band does have a bit of stretch to it. The size chart said a 16 would fit me best, but I ordered it in black last fall in a size 18 & it fits perfectly. So maybe size up one size if your a "full figured gal". The color is more of a burnt sienna vs salmon-orange-ish, but it is still a really pretty color, just darker than expected.

评论概述: Beautiful, well made, true to US sizing
评论详情: I ordered this to use as my wedding dress. I was nervous about sizing, because sometimes US and Asian/European clothing manufacturers use different sizing scales. (A large in US sizes might be a 3X in Asian sizes.) This dress is very much true to US sizing. It fits me perfectly and I love it! I get married in less than 10 days and I can’t wait to put this dress on again! It is well made, photos in description are very accurate. Delivery was super fast, too. I would buy again with confidence! Will update with photos after the wedding. Update: I felt like a Princess in this dress!! I suffer from poor body image, so I usually don’t like pictures, but I felt beautiful in this dress!! 👗
It wasn't what I expected.  It looked like it was for a girl not an adult.
Loved the dress was perfect. Looks much more expensive than it was. A beautiful choice!

I am 5’5”, 165 lbs., 36B. The dress is very pretty in person and comfortable. It’s not sheer. I don’t love how it fits me in the shoulders or how it hits my stomach, so it’s not the best dress for me, but I would still recommend it for others.

评论概述: Form fitting, but doesn't accentuate trouble areas!
评论详情: Wore this to a summer wedding (July 2023). It was like 110 degrees with humidity, outdoor wedding. This dress was perfect. I was sweating like a monster, but nothing bled through on the dress. It's form fitting in a flattering way, and holds the tummy in, while at the same time flaring out at the hips to actually make you look slimmer. I had so many compliments on it!
It fits so well, and is so beautiful! I love the material and how it feels on. I feel so pretty in this dress, I can't wait to show everyone at my party! I 120% recommend this dress!!

评论详情: I am 5'7" and 150lbs and this dress in a size 14 was too small - both in the arm holes and in the chest (I could not even fully zip up). The material particularly the lacy bodice felt cheap, and there was a very thick seam running down the middle of each breast.
Fits well. I wore it for my company Christmas party

I am only 5 feet tall so the length was longer on me than shown on the model, but some people wore long dresses to the event anyway so it was perfect. Looked a lot more expensive than it was. Seemed very well-made. For reference I wore a size 4: I am 5'0" and weigh 105 lbs.  Fit perfectly.

Normally wears a size medium or size 10 jeans.  Ordered a size 10. A little snug in the bust as she does have a larger bust area but the fabric is stretchy so easily stretched to allow for that. 评论概述: I got many compliments at the party where I wore it. I will order another dress from this company
评论详情: I am very happy that I ordered this dress It was delivered on time. The measurements are perfect for size 6. I received many compliments at the party where I wore it. I will order another dress from this company
Loved my new dress. It is a great dress to go dancing!
After ironing the dress it looked wonderful! Exactly as expected!!! Highly recommended!
Wore this to a wedding and it fit perfectly! Paired it with some black flats and I was comfortable and confident all evening.

The photos don’t do this dress Justice. I LOVE this dress. It’s absolutely beautiful.  We were inside a hotel’s conference center in central Texas in November. I don’t know what the inside temperature was, but this dress was unbelievable comfortable. I wasn’t hot or cold. The outside temperature was in the mid 70s. The dress is 100% polyester-inner lining as well as the sheer outer fabric.  The dress is true to color. I ordered teal. The entire dress is teal, no secondary colors.  I’m 5’1”, 139 pounds, 36DD, and wear a size 8 in my NY and Company petite dress pants. I’ve been wearing size 8 or 10 in jeans (Arizona Jean Co, Sonoma from Kohl’s). I ordered a size 10 in this dress due to others’ reviews. The 10 fit perfectly. I didn’t think the underarms were too high or tight. Maybe a smidge, but not enough to bother me.  The dress has no pockets :o(  The front on the bust has a vertical seam that caused the bust to be a bit pointy. You can see it from the side in one of the pictures. But again, I didn’t think it was that big of a deal. It’s hardly noticeable-I’m just anal about details.  In the photos, I’m wearing a Maideform T-Shirt bra with underwire. No push up. The straps on the dress are wide enough that you don’t need a strapless bra. And the back is high enough that you can’t see the back bra strap.  This dress is HAND WASH ONLY, and air dry. I followed the directions after wear and washed it in cold water in my tub, and am hanging it/laying it flat to dry. A little bit of the dye washed out when I was washing it-probably normal after a first wash.  I would recommend heels with this dress. I tried dressy, strappy sandals, but it just didn’t do the dress Justice.  This dress is amazing. My friends LOVED it. -Wife

Gorgeous dress and the quality is amazing! You can’t beat the price. I will say I wish the arm holes were a little bigger, the top was kind of in my armpit, but I can absolutely look over that it was very comfortable overall and form fitting and light. I’m short and big in the chest and I got a 2xl and it was perfect.
